Pre-Game Insights: Guy Bruhn's Pick: Take Los Angeles
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seattle Mariners have accounted for 175 two-baggers as a squad and have knocked 149 balls out of the stadium.
The Mariners have an earned run average of 3.50 on the season (1st in the league), and the staff has struck out 1,163 hitters.
The Mariners relievers have accumulated a save rate of 61.2% and has entered the game in 116 save situations.
Los Angeles has accumulated 130 home runs for the year as well as 488 RBIs.
The Angels have a WHIP of 1.321 and are the owners of a FIP of 4.58 as a unit on the year.
Fulmer has surrendered 199 base knocks while accumulating 203 strikeouts in 221 innings.
Others: The game will be played at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, CA, and will be televised on Root Sports Northwest.
